approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: Currently, the V-KYC team has to request the IT data server team to provide recordings. The recordings are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server and retrieved based on manual requests.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager).
All recordings of V-KYC shall be made available on this portal.
Recordings should be fetched as and when required.
Recordings should be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings should be available date and month wise.
An option for users to upload an Excel or text file with LAN IDs should be available.
The system should process the request upon file upload.
Results should be displayed in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table should have pagination displaying 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records should be downloaded at a time.
File upload should be in CSV/TXT format.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)

functional_requirements: Fetch V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Provide a portal/dashboard for accessing recordings.
Allow access to leads (TL & Process Manager).
Make all V-KYC recordings available on the portal.
Enable filtering by date and month.
Provide an option to upload a file with LAN IDs.
Process the request upon file upload.
Display results in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
Limit downloads to 10 records at a time.
non_functional_requirements: Access to the screen should be restricted to Team Leaders.
success_criteria: V-KYC recordings are easily accessible for audit.
Reduced dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
constraints: Recordings are stored on LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
assumptions: All approved PL-VKYC cases are within scope.
